extension.news: - Core/Signals: Don't re-register signal callbacks twice - Watchlist: Add logging to removeFromWatchlistBlind - Watchlist/Episodes/Movies/Home: Re-jig window-less watchlist handling; when resuming/watching an item directly from home without visiting the item view itself, try blindly removing items from watchlist if fully watched (didn't work before) - Core/KodiGUI: Less implicit checks for a window's autoplay capability - Opener: Implement/trigger window.onBlindClose if the window was only used for immediate playback, not for display - CE/LG/Player: Be less strict with alternate seek - CE/LG/Player: Clamp seek fix to +/- 10 seconds to fix edge cases (thanks @peaceoutt32) - CE/LG/Player: Dynamically increase "area of effect"/leeway for alternate seek - CE/LG/Player: Fix seek state not necessarily being reflected in the UI when using alternate seek - i18n: Update Hungiarian translation
